item.title: EmberScape Development[562/602]
item.dc:creator: @Cart Cart
item.description:
@Cart wrote:

JavaTC:

It’s looking really good Cart. Will it be open-source because this could bring 562s back to life again. Then again about a million kids would leach it and sell it for $20 or some shit (again -.-).

May release a open-source without GE.

@UPDATES.

Lukedawesome was kicked out.
“Nouish” as been tested to join us.

INGAME-
